title: 3 Gemstones in a row, bug or luck?
body:
Got a chest from earning an S, got a gemstone in there. Used it for a chest, got another gemstone. Used it for a chest, got ANOTHER gemstone..

Bug or luck? Don't want to open the last gemstone in case of bug abuse

replies.body: Ayyyyyyyy I'm hella jealous tbh xD! I've been waiting on my last gemstone for a couple months already.
